com.tabuto.j2dgf
Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Seed, Sprite, Zatropod, Zatropod.Limb, Zetatron, Zlife, Zretador
public interface Drawable

Interface Drawable is an abstraction representing something can be draw on a J2DGF package.

Version:
0.6.3
Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
